vase.title: Artisan Glass Vase
vase.description: Perfect for flowers or decorative branches, this glass vase is made by hand by talented glassblowers.

lamp.title: Industrial Lamp
lamp.description: Bring some industrial flair into your home with this ceiling lamp. Aluminum casing and exposed wiring completes the look. Not for outdoor use.

rug.title: Stripes of the Sea Rug
rug.description: This rug, woven with shades of cerulean, teal, and slate gray, with accents of earthy tones, evokes memories of the seaside.
